text: Brickellia floribunda (Chihuahuan brickellbush) is a North American species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to northern Mexico (Baja California Sur, Sonora and Chihuahua) and the southwestern United States (Arizona and New Mexico).Turner, B. L. 1997.
